org.cloudbus.cloudsim.allocationpolicies

Interface VmAllocationPolicy

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    PowerVmAllocationPolicy, PowerVmAllocationPolicyMigration, PowerVmAllocationPolicyMigrationDynamicUpperThreshold
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PowerVmAllocationPolicyAbstract, PowerVmAllocationPolicyMigrationAbstract, PowerVmAllocationPolicyMigrationDynamicUpperThresholdAbstract, PowerVmAllocationPolicyMigrationInterQuartileRange, PowerVmAllocationPolicyMigrationLocalRegression, PowerVmAllocationPolicyMigrationLocalRegressionRobust, PowerVmAllocationPolicyMigrationMedianAbsoluteDeviation, PowerVmAllocationPolicyMigrationStaticThreshold, PowerVmAllocationPolicyMigrationWorstFitStaticThreshold, PowerVmAllocationPolicySimple, VmAllocationPolicyAbstract, VmAllocationPolicySimple

    public interface VmAllocationPolicy
    An interface to be implemented by each class that represents a policy used by a Datacenter to choose a Host to place or migrate a given Vm.
    Author:
    Manoel Campos da Silva Filho

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static VmAllocationPolicy NULL
      A property that implements the Null Object Design Pattern for VmAllocationPolicy objects.

      • optimizeAllocation

        Map<Vm,Host> optimizeAllocation(List<? extends Vm> vmList)
        Optimize allocation of the VMs according to current utilization.
        Parameters:
        vmList - the vm list
        Returns:
        the new vm placement map, where each key is a VM and each value is the host where such a Vm has to be placed
